item.title: String won't display
item.dc:creator: @razorback razorback
item.description:
@razorback wrote:

Hey guys.

I have a string which will show in the runserver console but not in the server itself as a sendMessage.

[code] for(int i = 0; i < count+1; ++i) {
String x = HSfile.readLine();
System.out.println(x);
}[code]

For example that works fine. It is displayed in the console. However:

for(int i = 0; i < count+1; ++i) { String x = HSfile.readLine(); System.out.println(x); sendMessage(x);
Disconnects players from the server.

I am unsure as to why this is.

All help is appreciated.

Thank you

Read full topic
